name: Cartwright
description: A wagon and cart builder; adventurers can purchase or repair vehicles, learn about different transport options, or find specialized travel equipment.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the rich scent of wood, leather, and the metallic tang of iron fittings. The sound of hammers striking metal and saws cutting wood creates a rhythmic, industrious background. Half-finished wagons and carts line the space, while the air carries the promise of journeys and transportation.
